TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi PrintSystemJobInfo extends System.Printing.PrintSystemObject

summary.span: 详细定义打印作业。

span.span: Defines a print job in detail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类没有公共构造函数。This class has no public constructor. 若要获取对对象的引用, 请使用静态方法或以下实例方法之一: 、 或。To get a reference to a object, use the static method or one of the following instance methods: , , or . 许多打印作业属性 (例如作业是否已完成) 必须先从打印机传递到对象, 然后应用程序才能读取相应的属性 ()。Many print job properties, such as whether a job is completed, must be passed from the printer to the object before your application reads the corresponding property (). 方法提供此功能。The method provides this functionality. 同样, 如果应用程序更改属性的值, 则必须将更改写入计算机上的打印队列实用工具中。Similarly, when your application changes the value of the property, the change must be written to the print queue utility on the computer. 方法提供此功能。The method provides this functionality. 如果从派生具有其他可写属性的类, 则必须实现和方法的重写。If you derive a class from that has additional writable properties, then you must implement an override of the and methods. > [!CAUTION] > 命名空间中的类不支持在 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试从这些应用程序类型之一中使用这些类可能会产生意外的问题, 例如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果要从 Windows 窗体应用程序进行打印, 请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

summary.span: 将 对象属性的任何更改写入该对象所代表的实际打印作业中。

span.span: Writes any changes to the properties of the object to the actual print job that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有属性是可写的。Only the property is writable. 如果派生的类具有其他可写属性, 则必须使用自己的实现来 重写和方法。If you derive a class from that has additional writable properties, you must override the and methods with implementations of your own.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDeleted As Boolean
public: property bool IsDeleted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示打印作业（由 对象表示）是否已从打印队列中删除。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the print job, which is represented by the object, was deleted from the print queue.

value.span: 如果已删除打印作业，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the print job was deleted; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最初, 对象可以将自己的状态报告为 "已删除", 但要记住的是, 对象只*表示*真实的打印作业。It may seem paradoxical at first that an object can report its own status as deleted, but keep in mind that the object only *represents* a real print job. 从其打印队列中删除后, 不会自动在应用程序中释放对象。Deleting the latter from its print queue does not automatically dispose of the object in your application. 同样, 该对象不会从已删除其代表的打印作业之前创建的任何中删除。Similarly, the object is not removed from any that was created before the print job it represents was deleted. 例如, 如果在删除打印作业之前运行方法, 则返回的集合将包含表示打印作业的对象。For example, if the method is run before the print job was deleted, the returned collection will include a object that represents the print job. 删除打印作业时, 不会从集合中删除此对象。This object is not removed from the collection when the print job is deleted. 但如果随后再次运行, 则返回的集合将不包含表示已删除打印作业的成员。But if is then run again, the returned collection will have no members that represent the deleted print jobs. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在诊断打印作业的问题时使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property when diagnosing a problem with a print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#SpotTroubleUsingJobProperties](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#spottroubleusingjobproperties)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#SpotTroubleUsingJobProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#spottroubleusingjobproperties)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#SpotTroubleUsingJobProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#spottroubleusingjobproperties)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示打印作业是否已重新启动。

span.span: if the printer is printing; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当重新启动某个作业时, 它会完全打印。When a job is restarted, it prints in its entirety. 使用方法重新启动对比度, 这会在暂停时恢复作业。Contrast restarting with using the method, which resumes a job at the point it was paused.

span.span: if the print job was saved; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 对象的属性设置为`true` , 并且队列的属性已使用的方法提交, 则打印队列将保留打印的作业。A print queue retains printed jobs if the property of the object is set to `true` and if the properties of the queue have been committed with the method of the .

value.span: 一个标识打印作业的 。

span.span: An that identifies the print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的编号系统由打印服务器的操作系统和打印服务器是计算机还是打印服务器设备确定。Which numbering system is used is determined by the operating system of the print server and whether the print server is a computer or a print server appliance. 例如, Microsoft Windows XP 的操作系统以这种方式确定编号: 打开打印服务器时, 如果其所有打印队列都为空, 则由任何用户在服务器上提交的第一个打印作业, 并为其分配 ID 号2。For example, the operating system for Microsoft Windows XP determines the numbering in this way: when a print server is turned on, if all its print queues are empty, the first print job submitted on the server by any user and to any queue is assigned ID number 2. 为服务器上的每个后续作业分配一个数字, 该数字比该服务器上的上一个打印作业要大1。Each subsequent job on the server is assigned a number that is one greater than the previous print job on that server. 打印作业的打印队列对其编号没有影响: 如果作业按顺序发送到 QueueA、QueueB 和 QueueA, 则 QueueA 具有作业2和 4, QueueB 具有作业3。The print queue for the print job has no effect on its number: if jobs are sent to QueueA, QueueB, and QueueA, in that order, then QueueA has jobs 2 and 4, and QueueB has job 3. 为作业分配一个数字后, 该数字将永远不会更改, 即使其他作业完成打印或被取消或者服务器已重新启动。After a job is assigned a number, the number never changes, even if other jobs finish printing or are canceled, or if the server is restarted. 如果在服务器重新启动时一个或多个队列中已经有作业, 则会为第一个新作业分配一个编号, 该编号大于服务器启动时队列中的最高编号作业。If there are already jobs in one or more queues when the server is restarted, the first new job is assigned a number that is one greater than the highest numbered job that was in the queue when the server started. 但是, 在重新启动之前, 打印服务器不会重复使用数字。However, until it restarts, a print server does not reuse a number. 即使编号最大的作业在打印前被取消, 下一个作业也会获得一个较高的数字。Even if the highest numbered job is canceled before it is printed, the next job gets a number that is one higher. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在诊断打印作业的问题时使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property when diagnosing a problem with a print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#EnumerateJobsInQueues](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#enumeratejobsinqueues)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#EnumerateJobsInQueues](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#enumeratejobsinqueues)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#EnumerateJobsInQueues](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#enumeratejobsinqueues)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 Windows 8 及更高版本的操作系统上的 .NET Framework 4.5 开始, 写入到此流的数据必须作为包流的 XPS 格式。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5 on Windows 8 and later versions of the operating system, data written to this stream must be in XPS format as a package stream.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NumberOfPages As Integer
public: property int NumberOfPages { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取打印作业中的页数。

span.span: Gets the number of pages in the print job.

value.span: 一个 ，它指示打印作业的页数。

span.span: An that states the number of pages in the print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面是纸张或其他打印介质的一侧。A page is one side of a sheet of paper or other print media. 下表显示了此属性的值和所用的工作表的数量如何受打印作业是否对双面打印 (双工) 的调用、是否每个页面都有多个页面的请求, 或者是否同时为两者都调用。The following table shows how the value of this property, and the number of sheets used, is affected by whether the print job calls for two-sided printing (duplexing), whether it calls for multiple pages-per-sheet, or whether it calls for both. ### 双面打印和多页打印如何影响打印How duplexing and multipage printing affect printing |打印Duplexing|每页页数Pages per sheet|NumberOfPages 的值Value of NumberOfPages|纸张的物理页数Number of physical sheets of paper| |---------------|---------------------|----------------------------|----------------------------------------| |NoNo|11|与文档中的页数相同。Identical to the number of pages in the document.|与文档中的页数相同。Identical to the number of pages in the document.| |是Yes|11|与文档中的页数相同。Identical to the number of pages in the document.|文档页÷ 2 (向上舍入)。Document pages ÷ 2 (rounded up).| |NoNo|多页Multiple|文档页在每张纸上增加页数 (向上舍入)。Document pages ÷ Pages per sheet (rounded up).|文档页在每张纸上增加页数 (向上舍入)。Document pages ÷ Pages per sheet (rounded up).| |是Yes|多页Multiple|文档页在每张纸上增加页数 (向上舍入)。Document pages ÷ Pages per sheet (rounded up).|[文档页÷每个工作表的页数] ÷ 2 (向上舍入)。[Document pages ÷ Pages per sheet] ÷ 2 (rounded up).|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pause() cil managed

summary.span: 暂停打印作业，直到 运行。

span.span: Halts printing of the job until runs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果队列中有另一个作业, 则会在当前作业暂停时开始打印。If another job is in the queue, it begins printing when the current job is paused. 宿主还具有和方法。The hosting also has and methods. 如果打印队列已暂停, 恢复单个作业不会导致该作业恢复打印。If the print queue is paused, resuming an individual job does not cause that job to resume printing.

value.span: 一个 ，表示打印作业的优先级，如 、、 或 。

span.span: A that represents the priority of the print job as , , , or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 更新 对象的属性，以便它们的值与该对象所代表的实际打印作业的值相匹配。

span.span: Updates the properties of the object so that their values match the values of the actual print job that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对对象的属性所做的任何更改都必须使用方法写入实际打印作业。Any changes that you make to the properties of a object must be written to the actual print job by using the method. 当该方法运行时, 所有未提交的更改都将丢失。Any changes that you have not committed are lost when the method runs. 如果从派生具有其他属性的类, 则必须用自己的实现重写方法。If you derive a class from that has additional properties, then you must override the method with an implementation of your own.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Restart() cil managed

summary.span: 从头开始重新启动打印作业。

span.span: Restarts a print job from the beginning.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或者, 您可以使用方法, 该方法将重新启动暂停的打印作业, 并从暂停的点开始。Optionally, you can use the method, which restarts a paused print job, starting at the point it was paused.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Resume() cil managed

summary.span: 继续打印暂停的打印作业。

span.span: Resumes the printing of a paused print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宿主还具有和方法。The hosting also has and methods. 如果打印队列已暂停, 则恢复单个作业不会恢复打印作业的打印。If the print queue is paused, resuming an individual job does not resume the printing of the print job. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法恢复暂停的打印作业。The following example shows how to use this method to resume a paused print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#HandlePausedJob](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#handlepausedjob)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#HandlePausedJob](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#handlepausedjob)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#HandlePausedJob](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#handlepausedjob)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StartTimeOfDay As Integer
public: property int StartTimeOfDay { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取一天中打印作业可以开始打印的最早时间，用协调世界时 (UTC)（也称为格林尼治标准时间 [GMT]）午夜过后的分钟数表示。

span.span: Gets the earliest time of day, expressed as the number of minutes after midnight Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) (also called Greenwich Mean Time [GMT]), that the print job can begin printing.

value.span: 一个 ，指定打印作业可能的最早开始时间，用 (UTC) 午夜过后的分钟数表示。

span.span: An specifying the earliest possible start time for the print job, expressed as the number of minutes after midnight (UTC).

value.span: 最大值为 1439。

span.span: The maximum value is 1439.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在作业进入队列时, 此值会从托管的属性传播到每个对象。This value is propagated to each object from the property of the hosting at the time the job enters the queue. 如果更改, 则早于 的任何值都将更改为的值。If is changed, then any value that is earlier than is changed to the value of . 将作业添加到队列后, 可以[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]通过提供新值 (前提是它不早于)。After the job is added to the queue, it can be given a new value through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], provided that it is not earlier than . 如果你不在 UTC 时区, 则必须添加或减去60的倍数, 才能获取时区的正确时间。If you are not in the UTC time zone, you must add or subtract multiples of 60 to get the correct time for your time zone. 例如, 如果你处于太平洋时区的北美并且夏令时不起作用, 则本地时间比 UTC 早8小时。For example, if you are in the Pacific Time Zone of North America and daylight savings time is not in effect, then your local time is 8 hours earlier than UTC. 如果返回 960, 表示 UTC 中的 16:00 (4:00 PM) (因为 960/60 = 16)。If returns 960, that means 16:00 (4:00 PM) in UTC (because 960/60 = 16). 若要将此转换为太平洋时间, 必须减去 480 (= 8 \* 60) 分钟。To convert this to Pacific Time, you must subtract 480 (= 8 \* 60) minutes. 还必须记住, 时间在24小时后 (即, 1439th 分钟后) 滚动到零。You also must remember that time rolls over to zero after 24 hours (that is; after the 1439th minute). 如果返回 120, 表示 UTC 中的 2:00 AM。If returns 120, that means 2:00 AM in UTC. 若要将此转换为太平洋时间, 必须减去480分钟, 这会导致-360。To convert this to Pacific Time, you must subtract 480 minutes, which results in -360. 若要获取有意义的正值, 请将负数添加到一天的总分钟数 (1440), 结果为 1080 (6:00 PM) 太平洋时间的最终值。To get a positive value that has meaning, add the negative number to the total minutes in a day, 1440, resulting in a final value of 1080 (6:00 PM) Pacific Time. 有关帮助进行时区调整的方法, 请参阅、和。See , , and for methods that help make time-zone adjustments. 如果打印机始终可用, 则此属性在所有时区都返回0。If the printer is always available, then this property returns 0 in all time zones. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在诊断有问题的打印作业的过程中使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property as part of the process of diagnosing a problematic print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在作业进入队列时, 此值会从托管的属性传播到每个对象。This value is propagated to each object from the property of the hosting at the time the job enters the queue. 如果更改, 则任何晚于的值都将更改为的值。If is changed, then any value that is later than is changed to the value of . 将作业添加到队列后, 可以[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]通过提供新值 (前提是它不晚于)。After the job is added to the queue, it can be given a new value through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], provided that it is not later than . 如果你不在 UTC 时区, 则必须添加或减去60的倍数, 才能获取时区的正确时间。If you are not in the UTC time zone, you must add or subtract multiples of 60 to get the correct time for your time zone. 例如, 如果你处于太平洋时区的北美并且夏令时不起作用, 则本地时间比 UTC 早8小时。For example, if you are in the Pacific Time Zone of North America and daylight savings time is not in effect, then your local time is 8 hours earlier than UTC. 如果返回 960, 表示 UTC 中的 16:00 (4:00 PM) (因为 960/60 = 16)。If returns 960, that means 16:00 (4:00 PM) in UTC (because 960/60 = 16). 若要将此转换为太平洋时间, 必须减去 480 (= 8 \* 60) 分钟。To convert this to Pacific Time, you must subtract 480 (= 8 \* 60) minutes. 还必须记住, 时间在24小时后 (即, 1439th 分钟后) 滚动到零。You also must remember that time rolls over to zero after 24 hours (that is; after the 1439th minute). 如果返回 120, 表示 UTC 中的 2:00 AM。If returns 120, that means 2:00 AM in UTC. 若要将此转换为太平洋时间, 必须减去480分钟, 这会导致-360。To convert this to Pacific Time, you must subtract 480 minutes, which results in -360. 若要获取有意义的正值, 请将负数添加到一天的总分钟数 (1440), 结果为 1080 (6:00 PM) 太平洋时间的最终值。To get a positive value that has meaning, add the negative number to the total minutes in a day, 1440, resulting in a final value of 1080 (6:00 PM) Pacific Time. 有关帮助进行时区调整的方法, 请参阅、和。See , , and for methods that help make time-zone adjustments. 如果打印机始终可用, 则此属性在所有时区都返回0。If the printer is always available, then this property returns 0 in all time zones. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在诊断有问题的打印作业的过程中使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property as part of the process of diagnosing a problematic print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)]
